Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrtd WB via Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr & 67th: EB via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette & Promontory Dr due to blockage nr 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between UIC-Halsted and Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Damen due to police activty.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Damen due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted, and,
  • between O'Hare and Damen only.

 Shuttle buses have been requested between UIC-Halsted and Damen to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
